stories.text:
Picnic QA / Manual Tester - REMOTE

Picnic is a rapidly growing, venture backed startup based in Silicon Valley with over a million users within 2 months (faster than early snapchat, youtube, or music.ly [tiktok]), have better usage than leading social networks, and present an opportunity to positively impact socialization for a generation and beyond, shaping the internet and giving a taste of community to gen z.

We are looking for a remote QA/Manual Tester professional to help us maintain our app. We have a system composed of a mobile application that runs both on Android and iOS, and a backend website linked with several third-party services. We're looking to test all the features while we're rolling out the application.

Daily and Weekly Responsibilities Plan and execute manual tests on the whole system (app + backend + third-party services) on both Android and iOS Develop quality assurance standards and company processes for product inspection meet consumer demand Create and submit reports documenting errors for fixing Closely communicating with development team to solve problems

Objectives of this Role Document testing activities Remain available for frequent communication on our Discord channel

Skills and Qualifications Jira/Agile/Scrum knowledge Knowledge of quality assurance terminology, methods, and tools Analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills Work in a fast paced environment

Required Qualifications Excellent communication skills in English Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology and how QA functions within it

If you are interested, please email your resume to recruiting@picnic.zone.
